title: NGINX & PHP (Alpine)
notes: Valid PHP/NGINX image versions are listed on the [Docker hub](https://hub.docker.com/r/trafex/php-nginx)

env.name: CONTAINER_NAME
env.label: Container name
env.description: Container name (for docker, unlike 'Name' above which is only used by Portainer to manage displayed stacks)

env.name: VERSION
env.label: Trafex version
env.description: Version (see list of valid image versions on the Trafex Docker Hub at https://hub.docker.com/r/trafex/php-nginx/tags)

env.name: TRAFEX_PORT
env.label: Port
env.description: Port to use for the php server (check that it is not in use)

env.name: PHP_WEB_ROOT
env.label: Mount root
env.description: Path on host to use for the PHP application root. For Windows, enclose in quotes and escape path separators with double-backslashes.

env.name: RESTART
env.label: Restart
env.description: Restart behavior (on failure or Docker engine restart)
